game_description: ------------------------------------------------- Operation Description A Button : Ask your princess to jump. Sword in the right hand : Swinging a sword against a monster to reduce the monster's HP. Left-hand umbrella : By covering the princess with the shadow of the umbrella the princess's health will not be depleted. ----------------------------------------------------------------------- Story Once upon a time, there was a kind-hearted princess. She was heartbroken by the world's ongoing war with monsters. One day, she decides to go to the temple of the God of Creation at the end of the world to pray for peace. You are the knight who protects her. Use your sword to drive away monsters along the way, and Use your umbrella to provide her with shade.
